components/sidebar:
{{> components/sidebar/nav-mobile-close}} {{#if theme_settings.show_categories}} {{#if theme_settings.category_display '===' 'in_main_navigation'}} {{> components/nav-categories}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#all theme_settings.show_categories theme_settings.show_pages}}
{{/all}} {{#if theme_settings.show_pages}} {{> components/nav-pages}} {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.show_pages '===' false}} {{#if theme_settings.show_categories}} {{#if theme_settings.category_display '===' 'in_a_dropdown'}} {{> components/nav-pages only_shop_link=true}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
{{#if template_file '===' 'pages/category'}}
{{> components/category/filters}}
{{/if}} {{#if template_file '===' 'pages/brand'}}
{{> components/brand/filters}}
{{/if}} {{#if template_file '===' 'pages/search'}}
{{> components/search/filters}}
{{/if}} {{> components/header/customer-links}} {{> components/header/currency-selector}}
components/sidebar/nav-mobile-close:
<button class="nav-mobile-close" data-nav-mobile-toggle>
  <svg class="nav-mobile-icon-close" title="Close mobile menu" role="img">
    <use xlink:href="#icon-close"></use>
  </svg>
</button>
components/category/filters:
{{> components/faceted-search/index
  sort=pagination.category.sort
  subcategories=category.subcategories
  clear_url=category.url
  facets_enabled=category.faceted_search_enabled
  facets=category.facets
  facets_selected=category.selected
  shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price
  shop_by_brand=shop_by_brand
}}
components/brand/filters:
{{> components/faceted-search/index
  sort=pagination.brand.sort
  clear_url=brand.url
  facets_enabled=brand.faceted_search_enabled
  facets=brand.facets
  facets_selected=brand.selected
  shop_by_price=brand.shop_by_price
  shop_by_brand=shop_by_brand
}}
components/header/customer-links: {{#if settings.account_creation_enabled}} {{#if customer}} {{lang 'header.account'}} - {{lang 'header.log_out'}} {{else}} {{lang 'header.log_in'}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
components/nav-category-item:
• {{name}} {{#if children}}
      {{#each children}} {{> components/nav-category-item breadcrumbs=../breadcrumbs}} {{/each}}
    {{else}} {{/if}}
components/nav-categories-shop:
• {{lang 'nav.shop_link'}}
      {{#each categories}} {{> components/nav-category-item}} {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each items}}
  • {{title}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}}({{count}}){{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/multi:
{{#each items}}
  • {{title}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}}({{count}}){{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if total_items ">" 4}} {{lang 'filter.sort.show_more'}} {{lang 'filter.sort.show_less'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range: {{#each current_selected_items}} {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/rating:
{{#each items}}
  • {{> components/reviews/ratings rating=param_value}}{{lang 'filter.rating_up'}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}}({{count}}){{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/reviews/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
